alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 10:46PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Rain showers with gusty winds will impact portions of western Passaic, Orange, western Putnam and Rockland Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1040 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking rain showers with gusty winds along a line extending from Lenox to Millbrook. Movement was east at 50 mph. Temperatures are rapidly falling with the rain showers passage and some snow may mix in. No accumulations are expected but with the gusty winds and showers, visibilities will be reduced down to near a mile at times. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Middletown, West Milford, Ringwood, Port Jervis, Monroe, Walden, West Point, Warwick, Goshen, Sloatsburg, Cold Spring, Howells, New Windsor and Gardnertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
